items.sentence: Did you see Mary\'s reaction when she saw the spider?
Didn\'t you know Tom was planning to go to Australia?
Is it safe to eat food that has dropped on the floor?
Tom never allowed Mary to be alone with his children.
Tom put a couple of slices of bread into the toaster.
I love the fact that you always seem to care so much.
I need to return these library books by October 20th.
I plan to telephone Tom tomorrow and ask him to help.
What business is it of yours what I do with my money?
Why didn\'t you tell Tom the same time you told Mary?
Why don\'t we see if Tom wants to play cards with us?
I have absolutely no intention of paying ten dollars.
We are looking forward to seeing you and your family.
We can drive in Japan when we are eighteen years old.
Would you tell Tom why Mary doesn\'t want to do that?
He\'s studying hard so he can pass the entrance exam.
I can\'t figure out what the writer is trying to say.
I can\'t look at this photo without feeling very sad.
I\'ve been to more than ten foreign countries so far.
We didn\'t quite do exactly what Tom wanted us to do.
